messages.content: What services are provided by the organization 芒草心?

The organization 芒草心 provides self-Reliance Support Center, accommodation, Bathing Services, and company. It is active on weekdays and is located at No. 50, Yajiang St., Wanhua Dist., Taipei City 108008, Taiwan (R.O.C.). The phone number is 02-2331-5992.
Which non-governmental organizations in Taipei offer medical support?

Non-governmental organizations offering medical support in Taipei include 街頭家醫 and 街友及社會邊緣人服務. 街頭家醫 is located at No. 7, Ln. 26, Sec. 1, Zhongshan N. Rd., Zhongzheng Dist., Taipei City 100009, Taiwan (R.O.C.) with phone number (02)2312-0225. 街友及社會邊緣人服務 is located at 5F, No. 420, Zhongzheng Rd., Shilin Dist., Taipei City 111010, Taiwan (R.O.C.).
What services does the organization 人生百味 provide?

The organization 人生百味 provides short-term activities and company. It operates on weekdays and is located at 2F, No. 202, Sec. 2, Guiyang St., Wanhua Dist., Taipei City 108010, Taiwan (R.O.C.). The phone number is 02-2371-2771.
I need information on food supply services in Taipei for the homeless.

Organizations in Taipei providing food supplies for the homeless include 無家者送餐服務- 方舟協會, 街友及社會邊緣人服務, 台北街友關懷中心- 台灣救世軍, and 中華民國恩友愛心協會. These organizations are active mainly on weekdays and some also operate on Saturdays.
Can you tell me about the services provided by 無家者培力中心?
無家者培力中心 provides Employment Services, Bathing Services, and company. They are active on weekdays and located at No. 288, Chang’an W. Rd., Datong Dist., Taipei City 103012, Taiwan (R.O.C.).
Which organizations in Taipei offer services every day of the week?
Organizations in Taipei offering services daily include 圓通居, 廣安居, and 重修舊好工作站. They provide Social Welfare Services and Bathing Services.
Where can I find employment services in Taipei for the homeless?

In Taipei, employment services for the homeless are offered by 無家者培力中心 and 台北街友關懷中心- 台灣救世軍. Their locations and contact details vary, with some providing additional services like bathing and food supplies.
What is the office location and phone number of the organization 街友及社會邊緣人服務?
街友及社會邊緣人服務 is located at 5F, No. 420, Zhongzheng Rd., Shilin Dist., Taipei City 111010, Taiwan (R.O.C.). However, no phone number is provided.
Which organizations provide bathing services in Taipei?
Organizations in Taipei offering bathing services include 芒草心, 無家者培力中心, 街友及社會邊緣人服務, 台北街友關懷中心- 台灣救世軍, and 社團法人台灣芒草心慈善協會淋浴服務據點-香香澡堂, among others.
Where is the 無家者送餐服務- 方舟協會 located and what are their active days?
無家者送餐服務- 方舟協會 is located at 9F, No. 48, Sec. 1, Chengde Rd., Datong Dist., Taipei City 103622, Taiwan (R.O.C.). They are active on weekdays and Saturdays.
I need information about the 臺北市就業服務處萬華服務臺.

臺北市就業服務處萬華服務臺 provides Employment Services and Bathing Services. It is open Monday to Friday from 9:00 to 17:00 and is located at Taipei City, Wanhua District, Heping West Road, Section 3, No. 251, 3rd Floor. The phone number is (02)2308-0236.
Which organization in Taipei provides homeless care services?

In Taipei, homeless care services are provided by 財團法人基督教救世軍臺北街友關懷中心. They operate Monday to Friday from 9:00 to 17:00 and are located at Taipei City, Datong District, Jinxi Street, Lane 65, No. 42. Their phone number is (02)2552-0536.
What services are offered by 台北街友關懷中心- 台灣救世軍?

台北街友關懷中心- 台灣救世軍 offers food supplies, material supplies, Bathing Services, hair cutting service, and Employment Services. They are active on weekdays and are located at No. 42, Ln. 65, Jinxi St., Datong Dist., Taipei City 103047, Taiwan (R.O.C.). The phone number is (02)2552-0536.
Where can I find a social welfare service center in Wenshan District, Taipei?

The 臺北市文山社會福利服務中心 provides Social Welfare Services and Bathing Services. It operates Monday to Friday from 8:30 to 17:00 and is located at Taipei City, Wenshan District, Xinglong Road, Section 2, No. 160, 6th Floor. The phone number is (02)2932-3587.
Which organizations in Taipei are open on Saturdays and provide social welfare services?

In Taipei, organizations open on Saturdays and providing social welfare services include 廣安居 and 重修舊好工作站. They offer services from Monday to Sunday and are located in Datong and Zhongzheng districts respectively.
Can you provide details about the organization 南港恩友中心?

南港恩友中心 operates from Monday to Thursday and Saturday to Sunday. The location is No. 547, Sec. 7, Zhongxiao E. Rd., Nangang Dist., Taipei City 115011, Taiwan (R.O.C.). The phone number is (02)2782-4078. No specific services are listed for this organization.
What type of services does the organization 街頭家醫 provide?

The organization 街頭家醫 specializes in providing medical support. They operate on weekdays and are located at No. 7, Ln. 26, Sec. 1, Zhongshan N. Rd., Zhongzheng Dist., Taipei City 100009, Taiwan (R.O.C.). The phone number is (02)2312-0225.
Are there any services for the homeless on Jinxi Street, Taipei?

Yes, on Jinxi Street, Taipei, the 台北街友關懷中心- 台灣救世軍 provides various services including food and material supplies, Bathing Services, hair cutting, and Employment Services. They are located at No. 42, Ln. 65, Jinxi St., Datong Dist., Taipei City 103047, Taiwan (R.O.C.). The phone number is (02)2552-0536.
What services are available at 社團法人台灣芒草心慈善協會淋浴服務據點-香香澡堂?

The organization 社團法人台灣芒草心慈善協會淋浴服務據點-香香澡堂 offers Bathing Services. They operate Monday to Friday from 14:00 to 21:00 and are located at Taipei City, Wanhua District, Guangzhou Street, Lane 253, No. 17. The phone number is (02)2331-5992.
What government agencies in Taipei provide social welfare services?

Government agencies in Taipei that provide Social Welfare Services include 臺北市萬華社會福利服務中心, 臺北市大安社會福利服務中心, 臺北市中正社會福利服務中心, 臺北市文山社會福利服務中心, and 臺北市內湖社會福利服務中心. These centers offer services such as bathing and are located across various districts.
Who provides employment services on Heping West Road in Taipei?

Employment services on Heping West Road, Taipei, are provided by 臺北市就業服務處萬華服務臺. It is located at Taipei City, Wanhua District, Heping West Road, Section 3, No. 251, 3rd Floor. They operate Monday to Friday from 9:00 to 17:00. The phone number is (02)2308-0236.
Where can I find a service center for the homeless in Datong District, Taipei?

In Datong District, Taipei, homeless service centers include 台北街友關懷中心- 台灣救世軍 and 廣安居. These centers provide various social welfare services, including food supplies, bathing services, and employment support.
What services are offered at 臺北市中正社會福利服務中心?

臺北市中正社會福利服務中心 offers Social Welfare Services and Bathing Services. It operates Monday to Friday from 9:00 to 16:30 and is located at Taipei City, Zhongzheng District, Yanping South Road 207, 6th Floor. The phone number is (02)2396-2340.
Can you provide information about organizations that offer legal assistance for homeless individuals?

The data provided does not mention specific organizations offering legal assistance for homeless individuals in Taipei. It might be useful to contact general service providers for the homeless, as they may have information or referrals for legal assistance.
Are there any NGOs that provide transportation assistance for homeless individuals?

The provided data does not list any NGOs specifically offering transportation assistance for homeless individuals in Taipei. However, organizations offering broader support services might also assist with transportation or have partnerships that provide such assistance.
Where can homeless individuals access hygiene products and toiletries?
Organizations such as 台北街友關懷中心- 台灣救世軍 and 社團法人台灣芒草心慈善協會淋浴服務據點-香香澡堂 offer bathing services and may also provide hygiene products and toiletries to homeless individuals.
Are there any organizations that offer financial assistance for homeless individuals?

The data does not specify any organizations that provide direct financial assistance to homeless individuals in Taipei. Often, such support is integrated within broader social welfare services provided by governmental and non-governmental organizations.
Can you recommend shelters that accommodate homeless individuals with pets?

The provided data does not mention any shelters in Taipei that specifically accommodate homeless individuals with pets. It's advisable to contact local shelters directly to inquire about their policies regarding pets.
